author: Guest (Guest)
title: My 2 cents.
text:
I have also tried bbtether (latest) and opensuse 11.1 with verizon and all works great!

Unfortunately, the same cannot be said no matter what I do for the same except opensuse 11.2... :(

Connection timed out errors!  It is as if the usb-mass storage or something else has a hold on it and I have tried everything I can think of including modprobe -r usb-storage blah blah blah...

Help on this would be so appreciated!
